column5: Seems like forever Since iv posted on this forum...   Iv been waitting for this stupid ice to FREEZE!!!!!!!!   its frozen........ but its ugly out there.   2 '' of slush/water/1/2 frozen soft    mixed with 1'' of water then the black ice starts 3-4 ''  THANK GOD!!!!!!!!!!!!!       The Pike fishing has just begun and the tip-ups were going all over the place.     Today was a mix of perch, bass and pike.        The action was on and off. but the jiggin action was steady.  20-30 perch were caught.  and a dozen bass. 3 1/2lbs beeing the big one.  We ended the day on a seriouse note.       This pike was a seriouse fighter hand down the best TOE to TOE fighter out there.  some would call him M.M.A stuff.  in the end hes going to be our new year supper!    :jerry:     Much more to come stay tuned.
Wow !!!! That's a wicked way to end 2012 guys !!! Some awesome early season ice fishing that's for sure ... Sure makes it worthwhile !!!!! Cheers
The pike worshiper surfaced it's ugly face     but I love it   About friggin time Kev

HEY DUDE have you been on your favourite lake yet for some POLKADOTES!?!?!?!!  lets plan something solid me you and paul !!!!! RAINBOW!!!!!!  Better make osme salties mon ami!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  and give me a bag of that COURSE SALT! would ya  :whistling:

No haven't been out yet but have a date coming January 7th... It's a special time for my dad and I   Look forward to slamming some dots on ice  Rainbows sounds good... let me know your schedule and will make it happen
Sorry I didn't make it out Kevin............I got distracted by a couple of Great Grey Owls
wow, looks like a fun day of fishing, bet your new years dinner will be tasty.  Cheers.
Right on!  Great post!  Gets me pumped for pike fishin!
Just fantastic!  The colors on all those fish were amazing! Great day on the ice, thanks for the adrenaline rush!
Ok...finally you've posted an insane ice report.  NOWWWWW I can go icefishing
You have a really nice playground there! Nice fish!
